misc-unused-alias-decls.description:
Description

Finds unused namespace alias declarations.

namespace
my_namespace
{
class
C
{};
}
namespace
unused_alias
=
::
my_namespace
;
misc-unused-alias-decls.option:
Static analysis (Clang-Tidy) options are configured via .clang-tidy file.

This rule has no specific options.
